Name: Wasted Pizza
About the game: Wasted Pizza is an Online Multiplayer shooter game where you will be playing as an untouched pizza in a room full of all the other pizzas but be aware you aren't the only untouched pizza out there. Your mission is hiding amongst the other pizzas, spot and shoot tomatos on the other untouched pizzas. Don't forget you are a special pizza that is capable of jumping on top of buildings and platforms but that means the other untouched pizzas can do the same. So things might get a bit more difficult for you. So go and use this tomatos launcher you have to get some stains on them!
